LanguageData.RICS.Twitch.UseWhisperForCommandsTooltip: Allow viewers to send commands via whispers (private messages). Default: ON - Viewers can whisper commands. Disable: Only allow commands in public chat.
LanguageData.RICS.Twitch.ForceUseWhisperTooltip: Force viewers to use whispers for ALL commands (reduces chat clutter). ON: Commands in public chat are ignored. OFF: Commands work in both chat and whispers. Note: When enabled, a reminder message will be sent periodically.
LanguageData.RICS.Twitch.WhisperReminderTimerTooltip: How often to remind viewers to use whispers (in seconds). 0 = Never send reminders. 300 = 5 minutes (recommended). When "Force whisper-only commands" is enabled, this controls how often the reminder message appears in chat.
LanguageData.RICS.Twitch.WhisperReminderDisabled: Reminder: Disabled (no chat messages will be sent)
LanguageData.RICS.Twitch.WhisperLimitationNote: Note: Twitch limits bot whisper replies to certain users.
LanguageData.RICS.Twitch.WhisperLimitationTooltip: Twitch Platform Limitation: ‚Ä¢ Bots can only send whispers to users who: - Have subscribed to the channel - Have received a whisper from the bot before - Are followed by the bot account ‚Ä¢ This is a Twitch API restriction for spam prevention. ‚Ä¢ Public chat replies will still work normally.
